content.p: The Human Resources Department offers a range of services aimed at supporting managers and staff with both operational and strategic matters. All information from HR organised by process for ease of navigation. From annual leave to flexible working, we explain what to do while working at the University of Nottingham. Starting a new job is an exciting challenge. If you’re new to the University, we’re here to help you settle into your role and welcome you into our community. As a line manager, you’re responsible for making sure members of staff know where to find the information and support they need to do their jobs effectively. Whatever your background, there are plenty of opportunities to join us at the University of Nottingham. To help you find the role that’s right for you, we update our current vacancies every day.
